front.title: Conclusion of SenderID and SPF experiments

abstract.t: This memo concludes the SMTP Service Extension for Indicating the Responsible Submitter of an E-Mail Message (RFC4405), Sender ID: Authenticating E-Mail (RFC4406), Purported Responsible Address in E-Mail Messages (RFC4407) and Sender Policy Framework (SPF) for Authorizing Use of Domains in E-Mail, Version 1 (RFC4408), experiments.
